挪借.definition: to borrow money for a short time

挪用.definition: to shift (funds); to (legitimately) take funds set aside for one purpose in order to use them for another; to embezzle; to misappropriate

挪窩兒.definition: (dialect) to move (after being some time in the same place); to move (house)

挪開.definition: to move (sth) aside; to step aside; to move over (when sitting on a bench); to shift (one's gaze)
